text:
If you still use 100 random AI tools, save this.

Here are 9 tools that pros use:

✦ Writing (with your voice) → wisprflow.ai
✦ Image editing → gemini.google.com
✦ Presentations → gamma.app
✦ Meeting notes → granola.ai
✦ Linkedin → app.easygen.io
✦ Video editing → opus.pro
✦ Automation → Zapier.com
✦ Website → blink.new
✦ Writing → claude.ai

☑ Free AI guides → https://lnkd.in/dSj2SU9Z
